name: game

scripts.deps:reinstall: rimraf node_modules package-lock.json dist && npm run deps:install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run dev:bot-api" --names netlify-dev-server,telegram-bot-api --prefix-colors bgGreen,bgBlue
scripts.deploy:debug: npm run deploy:verbose && npm run debug
scripts.debug: concurrently "netlify logs:function deploy-succeeded" "netlify logs:function bot" "netlify logs:function api" --names deploy-succeeded,bot,api --prefix-colors bgGreen,bgBlue,bgYellow

author: Sam V <openminds.dev.studio@gmail.com>
description: Welcome to the **Game Project**! This repository contains a **modern JavaScript/TypeScript game**, powered by **Vite**, designed for an optimized development experience. The project features **server-side logic**, **real-time interactions**, and a **scalable architecture**.
